concept.title: Region Naming
concept.shortdesc: To get the full range of capabilities for your cached data regions, follow 's region naming guidelines.

conbody.p: The safest approach when naming your regions is to use only alphanumeric characters and the underscore character and to keep your region names short. This permits you the full range of region configurations and allow you to perform all available operations on the region.

Following these guidelines for naming regions:
Do not use the separator slash character ‘ / ’.
Do not begin region names with two underscore characters "__" as this is reserved for internal use.
To run queries against your data, restrict your region names to alphanumeric characters and the underscore character.
